body_html:
In the related thread you cite, there is a suggestion from @concretevitamin:
" a quick workaround is to use, for variables, tf.get_variable(..., partitioner=..), and for non-ref tensors, tf.split(). "

Is this not feasible for your model?

body:
In the related thread you cite, there is a suggestion from @concretevitamin:
" a quick workaround is to use, for variables, tf.get_variable(..., partitioner=..), and for non-ref tensors, tf.split(). "

Is this not feasible for your model?
